Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that people can use to communicate over long distances.
The student can incorporate the use of sound in the device to demonstrate how it aids communication.
The student can identify and label the materials used to build the device in their drawing.
The student can depict how the device successfully sends or receives information over a distance.
The student can show in their drawing how the device is an important solution for helping people communicate.
